item.title: Evaluate the environmental footprint of GenAI with EcoLogits
item.description: I presented the state of Green AI and GenAI Impact methodology and tool EcoLogits to assess the environmental footprint of generative AI. This event was organized by the Compar:IA team in collaboration with the French Ministry of Culture and beta.gouv.fr for the 2025 AI Action Summit in France.

item.title: Assessing the environmental footprint of AI models at Meta
item.description: I was invited by Meta FAIR team to explain how to better account for AI environmental foorprint during the training phase. The objective of this talk was to provide pratical ways to enhance carbon emissions disclosure, such as what Meta already does for its Llama models.

item.title: Environmental Impacts of GenAI with EcoLogits at ADIRA
item.description: In this talk for the ADIRA, we explore the environmental impacts of generative AI. We highlight the difference between training and inference impacts, as well as the growing environmental footprint of new LLMs. We also emphasize the need for a reporting standard to better assess environmental impacts, including hardware manufacturing and multiple criteria (carbon footprint, abiotic resources, water consumption, etc.).

item.title: Green AI Ecosystem at Hub France IA
item.description: An overview of the Green AI french ecosystem for the Hub France IA sustainability working group.

item.title: Estimate and reduce AI's environmental impacts in the cloud
item.description: In the webinar hosted by FinOps x GreenOps Meetup, I present how to evaluate and reduce the environmental impacts of AI models in the cloud.

item.title: Boavizta Workshops: Infra, Cloud and AI at Green Coding Summit
item.description: Benjamin Le Bigot and I participated the Green Coding Summit 2023 in Berlin to represent Boavizta. We gave two workshops on the core methodologies and tools developed by the non-profit.

item.title: The great challenges of generative AI (white paper)
item.description: This webinar presents the Data For Good white paper on the risks and challenges of generative AI technologies. The white paper is available in french only.

item.title: Continuous estimation of environmental impacts of ML solutions
item.description: In this webinar hosted by Datacraft, I present available methodologies, best practices and tools to estimate the environmental impacts of AI technologies on the whole life cycle.

item.title: Evaluate environmental impacts of AI with SoftAWERE
item.description: In a webinar for the German AI Association, Benoit Petit and I presented our work on SoftAWERE a project to evaluate the environmental impacts in GitLAB CI/CD pipelines. In this talked we focused on an AI use case. This project is supported by the SDIA, Boavizta, Helio and Hubblo.

item.title: Integrate ICT environmental impacts with BoaviztAPI
item.description: In this workshop hosted by Planet Tech’Care, we present BoaviztAPI, one of main the project at Boavizta. BoaviztAPI enables developers and organizations estimate the environmental impacts of IT resources such as servers, cloud instances and end-user devices. We explain how the bottom-up methodology is built and demostrate some use cases using the API.

item.title: Alygne consumers and investors values with their actions using applied NLP
item.description: A presentation on what we do at Alygne and how we are making frugal AI in the NLP field. This presentation was done at IA Pau.

item.title: Multicriteria impact assessment of ICT at Boavizta
item.description: A short presentation on the methodologies and tools that we develop at Boavizta. This presentation was done at GreenAI UPPA.
